price: 96. Ilaa laga soo furo (moos xirkii) Yuug iyo Yamaayuug, waxayna ka soo dhaadhici taag walba si degdeg ah.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā futiḥat yajūju wamajūju wahum min kulli ḥadabin yansilūna
